archimate:Requirement.name: SA.2.2.5g: g) dealing with security issues effectively via agreed points of contact within the organisation, who are available at predetermined times (e.g. 24 hours a day, 365 days a year).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
